home.title: PokeLink Trade Board
home.subtitle: Smoothly exchange the cards you want and the cards you can offer!

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.subtitle: Create an account and start trading Pokémon cards

createList.title: Create New Card List
createList.subtitle: Create a card list for trading and exchange with other users.

cardSelection.title: Card Selection
cardSelection.description: Select cards to add to the list

loginRequired.title: Don't have any cards?
loginRequired.description: Please log in to create a card list.

collages.title: Collage Images
collages.subtitle: Create collages of multiple cards and share on X

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to contact us. We will review and respond at a later date.

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Please fill in the required information and submit

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Q. How long does it take to get a response?
faq.a1: We usually respond within 1-3 business days.
faq.a2: If you can't log in, please try resetting your password.
faq.a3: We welcome requests for new features. Please let us know in detail.

notice.title: Notice
notice.item1: • Responses may be delayed on weekends and holidays
notice.item2: • For urgent matters, please add [URGENT] to the subject

share.title: Share This Post
share.subtitle: Share the post in your preferred way
share.tip: You can also copy the link and share via email or chat
